markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Constrict](/Actions.aspx?ID=2285) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 210 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Requirements** The snake has a smaller creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20).

</column>

---

The snake deals 12 bludgeoning damage to the grabbed creature; the creature must attempt a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save against your class DC. If the snake is a specialized animal companion, increase this damage to 20.
name: Constrict
requirement: The snake has a smaller creature  grabbed .
requirement_markdown: The snake has a smaller creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20).
